#summary How to run tests

= Running Tests =

Run Chrome with these flags:

<pre>
/Applications/Google\ Chrome.app/Contents/MacOS/Google\ Chrome --allow-file-access-from-files &> /dev/null &
</pre>

To run this in Firefox you need to change a pref:

<pre>
security.fileuri.strict_origin_policy = false
</pre>

Navigate to:

<pre>
traceur/test/test.html
</pre>
